Tag Name       : init_helper_options
Dist file path : dist/gtm/tags/CustomHTML/init_helper_options.txt

Tag Configuration:

  |- Tag Type : CustomHTML
  |- HTML     : 
  |  |- Src Path : dist/gtm/tags/core/html/init_helper_options.html
  |- Advanced Settings :
  |  |- Tag firing priority : 1
  |  |- Tag firng options   : Once per page
  |  |  |- Tag Sequencing :
  |  |  |  |- Fire a tag before : Check
  |  |  |  |  |- Setup Tag   : analytics_helper
  |  |  |  |- Fire a tag after init_helper_options fire : Check
  |  |  |  |  |- Cleanup Tag : You will place here the tag (you need to create one CustomHTML tag) who will run your project core
  |- Triggering        :
  |  |- Firing Triggers : All Pages - Page View
